text: Heliconia willisiana is a species of plant in the family HeliconiaceaeJosé E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 412-413, f. sn., Heliconia willisiana It is endemic to Ecuador.http Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia willisiana ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador willisiana Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
